name: Mini Jet Lag Mask + Moisturizer
about: What it is:An enhanced, fragrance-free formula that nourishes, hydrates, and calms your skin with niacinamide, glycerin, hyaluronic acid, and antioxidants..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and pores, visibly brightens, and promotes even-looking tone and texture..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:As of June 15, 2021, Jet Lag Mask is back with a fragrance-free formula featuring new skin-soothing ingredients like vitamin B5 (panthenol), chamomile (allantoin), and comfrey (bisabolol).
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and pores, visibly brightens, and promotes even-looking tone and texture. .-Glycerin: Provides lasting hydration for soft- and supple-feeling skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Draws hydration into skin for a firm, plump, healthy, glowing appearance. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diheptyl Succinate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sorbitan Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Panthenol, Physalis Angulata Extract, Castanea Sativa (Chestnut) Seed Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosphingosine, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a thin, even layer to clean, dry skin with your fingertips. .-May be used under and over the eye area. .-Leave on for 10 minutes for maximum hydration..-Blot with a warm cloth or tissue if necessary (no need to rinse)...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove plastic cap..-Recycle aluminum tube and carton.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever bought. It leaves my skin so hydrated, and plump and glowy it’s actually insane and you don’t even need to use much. This is my second time repurchasing!! Also lasts forever my last tube lasted me 4.5 months! forever I think

really great product kept my skin moist in dry weather, but i think it is a little too expensive for how much product you receive. also, it’s a little bit oily so if you have oily skin/don’t like oily texture i wouldn’t try this and would instead go for laneige water bank, etc. still great for dry weather and dry patches!

reviews.review_title: Gentle and Effective—Perfect for Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the mini size of this product to give it a try. Before this, I was using one from Glow Recipe, and as someone with sensitive skin, switching products can be a bit nerve-wracking. However, I’ve had a great experience with this one. It leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft, and I haven’t noticed any excess oil or irritation. Overall, I’m very pleased with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had gotten this in a sephora favorites bag and tried it last night after my skincare routine. Id like to think my skin isn’t sensitive in the slightest but this BURNED. And i will never use again i wish i liked it :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product last night and it’s caused some burning and redness. I do have slightly sensitive skin. It came as part of my Sephora birthday gift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I’m in LOVE. It’s so hydrating without breaking me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry and flaky skin and this moisturizer has changed my lifeee. It’s lightweight but also super thick and moisturizing and doesn’t feel oily on my face! It absorbs pretty quick but still leaves my face feeling hydrated. I definitely recommend it for anyone with dry skin :)

reviews.review_title: Good, But Overhyped – Solid Hydration, Nothing Rev
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: nice, hydrating cream that feels good on the skin, but I honestly don’t see the hype beyond it being a basic moisturizer. It’s great for hydration and leaves skin soft, but if you’re expecting transformative results, this isn’t that product.  I appreciate that it’s fragrance-free and versatile – it works as an overnight mask, moisturizer, or primer. But for the price, I expected a little more. There are plenty of moisturizers with stronger active ingredients (like peptides or ceramides) that provide deeper skin benefits for less.  If you just need simple hydration, it’s a solid choice. But if you’re after something that targets aging, firming, or noticeable skin improvement, you might find it underwhelming. It’s good, but I wouldn’t say it’s a must-have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it does make my skin feel hydrated but unfortunately it pills and doesn’t make my skin feel smooth so i wouldn’t repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. It thick and makes my skin feel amazing. I have already repurchased it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must-have product!! So thick, rich, and creamy and a perfect prep for makeup. I love using this before makeup, on my hands, and overnight as a mask. It has quite a lot of product, and is overall amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love! got this for christmas and its do rich and creamy. perfect perfect for dry skin its nice and thick and you dont have to squeeze the living daylights out of it! just pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 5 out of 5- within 10 minutes of using this I noticed my skin looking glowy and lines reduced! Niacinimide is an incredible ingredient. Love this formula will be a new favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overrated in my opinion. Works like any other moisturiser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most hydrating moisturizer I’ve ever used. I was on the lookout for a great moisturizer and I found it in the jet lag moisturizer. It is hydrating and leaves my skin so clear.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my skin care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this product and I am obsessed!it leaves my face feeling very hydrated and it doesn’t give that sticky feeling. My skin is so smooth and hydrated right after applying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In  May 2024 I got the Jet Lag mask as part of the birthday gift reward from Sephora. It sat in my stash of samples for months. It’s the day after Christmas and I cannot believe my experience with this mask from last night. I must leave a review.   I came home from holiday festivities parched. Full of wine, cheese, pasta, and cake I knew I had to get ready for bed. I double cleansed and applied a thin layer of Jet Lag. The instructions say to rinse off but I was asleep before I knew what happened. Today my skin is soft and looks no different before the evening’s festivities. This is not for my weekly mask routine due to the price point but would purchase the mini for the occasional use. Definitely suggest trying JetLag if it is offered as a birthday item again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so good. It's so moisturizing without feeling heavy at all. I see noticeable difference in my acne and texture overnight every time I use this. Such an amazing product, I highly recommend. Some people have made reviews explaining that for them it peeled or pilled. If you experience this I'd say just dampen your face. While the product says apply on dry skin, if u find it pills for you dampen your skin and it should solve your problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 5 out of 5- within 10 minutes of using this I noticed my skin looking glowy and lines reduced! Niacinimide is an incredible ingredient. Love this formula will be a new favorite
